pr_title: Implements @ignite_versions decorator. Add support to override parame…

timeline.message: Implements @ignite_versions decorator. Add support to override parameters through --globals ignite_versions

timeline.bodyText: As we introduce own decorator to work with versions - let's remove requirement to use str for versions. It's ugly
timeline.author: timoninmaxim
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,20 +39,17 @@ class AddNodeRebalanceTest(IgniteTest):
     REBALANCE_TIMEOUT = 60
 
     @cluster(num_nodes=NUM_NODES + 1)
-    @parametrize(version=str(DEV_BRANCH))
-    @parametrize(version=str(LATEST))
-    def test_add_node(self, version):
+    @ignite_versions(str(DEV_BRANCH), str(LATEST))

replies.bodyText: Unfortunatelly, args should be json serializable. I'm afraid that it is not possible.
replies.author: ivandasch

replies.bodyText: It is possible after one bug in ducktape is resolved. I'll fix it ASAP, then I will rewrite it
replies.author: ivandasch

timeline.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/ignite-ducktape' into ducktape-versions-decorator
